name: RobloxLight
description:
Roblox Light Theme, made by AlgraMatron.


Made when im bored lol.


REQUIRED FONT :
Bubblegum https://www.dafont.com/bubblegum.font

Features:
    
    Adblocker
    Roblox Light Theme
    Smooth Animations
    Fade Looking
    Rounded Border


Some of these codes are from another user, credit to the respectful owner.
Roblox 2019 by kickedbyconsole: https://userstyles.org/styles/154097/roblox-2019-description
Roundify for Roblox by SmeersROBLOX: https://userstyles.org/styles/131057/roundify-for-roblox

My Roblox Username : AlgraMatron
